Name: Storekeeper Revenge
About the game: Storekeeper is a miniature story puzzle game with simple mechanics. The plot will describe the period of life of a simple inhabitant of the darknet, the path of a long life. The gameplay consists of emails that need to be delivered to the browser. Managing one email is followed by others. There may be difficulties, the VPN will turn off and you will have to restart the level. The game also has its own version of playboy, collect magazines on the levels in hard-to-reach places. After completing all the levels, the ending will open. - hardcore puzzle - cool soundtrack - Atmospheric - interesting stories to read
